resources:
This Apps Purpose Every HBCSS requires complete transparency for optimal effect which this App aims to be. This App was created to help change peoples behaviours in regards to Health by allow personalised choices and queries for your medical issues. In this sense this app has given any user the ability to search for their own symptom or ailment and have personalised answers provided to them. What We Ask For While providing a personalised experience to the user was the main goal, other factors are at play. I kindly ask, if you have the time, to fill in this form detailing your experience with this app as data within HBCSS research is sparse. Thank you for your involvement with this project. Consider completing this survey \nHere
Add Exercise General Information
